textos_fuente.text: Town of Melville | (337) 623-4226 | Melville, LA (337) 623-4226 Town of Melville Home Administration Resources Community Events Contact Us Contact Us Learn More About Us! Louisianaâ€™s Small Town with Big Fishing! The Town of Melville is the Louisiana town that is known for its catfish fishing as well as its small-town charm. Weâ€™re a community of just under 2,000 people who love our town and are proud of living here. If you are interested in learning more about Melville, LA, please send us an inquiry using the contact form below. Donâ€™t miss our Community Events page! Thatâ€™s where youâ€™ll find listings for all the fun happenings that take place in Melville every year. Thanks for visiting our websiteâ€”we hope youâ€™ll drop by to see us in person! To report a gas-related issue call the Town Hall of Melville Monday - Friday 8:30 AM â€“ 4:00 PM at (337) 623-4226. After Hours call the Melville Police Department at (337) 623-5777 or call 911.The LA One-Call Center phone number is 811. Customers should report gas leaks or other gas related information to Town of Melville. FAQS â€“ Family Fun Town WHERE "FUN" IS OUR MIDDLE NAME info@familyfuntown.com Where "Fun' is our Middle Name Attractions Birthdays Private Events Cage Rental Menu Specials Arcade Card Calendar FAQS Is there an admission fee to enter Family Fun Town? Admission and parking are always free, Except during posted special events (which will be posted in advance). You pay as you go for what you want to play. Do you charge for parents to watch their kids? No! We are happy you are here supervising your children. What forms of payment do you take? Cash, Visa, Mastercard, AmEx and we are now happy to accept Apple pay. As well, if you have â€œcash valueâ€ on your Family Fun Town â€œFun Cardâ€, you may use that to pay for attractions and â€œThe Pit Stopâ€. Do you take checks? Only from organizations that have reserved a visit with us. Do you have an ATM? No. What does it cost to park at Family Fun Town? Parking and Admission are always free at Family Fun Town. Do you offer group rates? Yes, we have great packages for 10 or more booked in advance. Party and full facility rentals are available as well. Can I bring in a birthday cake? Yes! If you have reserved a party with us, we provide the paper products. If you havenâ€™t, you must bring in your own paper products, but please remember, we do not permit any other outside food or beverages. Do you have cakes available for purchase? Unfortunately no, yet if you do bring your own cake we can store it in our walk in refrigerator until you are ready to serve the cake. Can I bring in food from the outside? Sorry, we do not permit outside food, drinks or candy. Does â€œThe Pit Stopâ€ have any fast food? â€œThe Pit Stopâ€ has a Fast Counter where quick serve items may be purchased. These items include pizza slices, hot dogs, pretzels, nachos and soft drinks. Does â€œThe Pit Stopâ€ take reservations for lunch or dinner? Yes we do. You may reserve a booth (up to 3 at a time, if available). How many guests can The Pit Stop seat? We have 12 booths that can seat up to 4 people and 48 people total can sit inside. What do you charge to cut my cake? We do not charge a cutting fee it is included in all party packages. Can I have a private party at Family Fun Town? Yes. For more information, please contact us at (386) 775-3181 or info@familyfuntown.com . How far in advance should I make a party reservation? As a rule of thumb, parties should be reserved at least 2 weeks in advance. However, if we have space available, weâ€™ll take your reservation at any time, including walk in parties with restrictions. NOTE: Private events, a much longer lead time is needed. Do you sell Gift Certificates? Yes. We sell Family Fun Town â€œFun Cardsâ€ in any denomination. Be sure to follow our social media for specials and bonuses when you purchase â€œFun Cardsâ€. @familyfuntown Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube Can I use my laptop and go online at Family Fun Town? Yes, we have WiFi, as well as limited charging outlets available in our cafÃ© seating! Please ask any of our staff, so they can get you the password. Does Family Fun Town do cash sponsorship? Yes! Any non-profit is eligible to host a fundraiser with us. We donate 10-15% of the proceeds back to your organization. Please call us today to book your event. Spirit Nights, Mini Golf Tournaments, bring us your idea. Will you donate something to an auction for my childâ€™s school? Yes! Family Fun Town is happy to donate services to non-profits. Please contact us and we will try to accommodate your requests. As the parent, if I say it is ok for my child to drive even though they are too short, will you let them? Sorry, no. We are mandated by the manufacturer and the state on all our rides and attractions. What kind and how many arcade games do you have? We rotate and update games in our arcade frequently, so the number of games fluctuates. On average we have 25 Card Redemption Games, 10 Video Games and another 10-12 Specialty Games where you can try your luck at winning large prizes instantly. What batting cages do you have? We have Softball and Baseball cages with varying pitch speeds from slow pitch softball to 70 mph baseball. 20 pitches per token, as well as hourly cage rentals available. Bring your own bat and helmet or we have bats and helmets for you to use as well. How fast do the Go Karts go? Our Go Karts go approximately 18mph. Single person and double person karts to choose from. What kind of shoe is required on Family Fun Townâ€™s attractions? The best shoe is a closed-toe athletic style shoe. However, we do permit other footwear. If I purchase an unlimited play package can I share it with someone else? Sorry, no you cannot. If I purchase an unlimited play package and donâ€™t play for the full time, can I use the remaining time at a later date? The time starts ticking at the first attraction played, so the package will time out after the number of hours purchased. Can we play outside at night? Yes! Family Fun Townâ€™s outdoor attractions are fully illuminated. Open Sunday-Thursday until 9pm, Friday and Saturday until 11pm, weather permitting. What is a Family Fun Town Fun Card? The Fun Card functions just like a debit card, but for Family Fun Town attractions only. Fun Cards replace tickets and tokens. You load and reload a fun card with any amount to play at Family Fun Town. Never any fees, and tickets can be accumulated. About Park It is our goal to make your Family Fun Town experience as friendly, comfortable, and FUN as possible. Volusia Countyâ€™s Family Fun Town is a great place for all ages to enjoy our exciting family friendly entertainment complex, including: Birthday Parties, Mini Golf, Go-Karts, Batting Cages, Arcade Games and many more fun filled family attractions.Â  We take great pride in the appearance of our facility as well as the level of service that we provide. Our entire staff is dedicated to providing an excellent Family Fun Town experience. Quick Links Home Specials Events Attractions Contact FAQS Contact Info 401 S. News & Media Member Login REGISTER HERE Give Search for: Contact 2025-08-25T10:48:20-06:00 Contact Us Lakeland Hills YMCA is community-centered, bringing people of all ages and backgrounds together, to nurture potential and mobilize local communities to effect lasting and meaningful change. We look forward to helping you with your needs and answering any questions you may have. Feel free to contact us via the form below or through a membership representative at one of our local YMCAs. Contact Us Form Ã— Contact Lakeland Hills Family Y Name * First Last Email * Who do you want to contact? * President and Chief Executive Officer, Alex Martinez Fund Development Associate, Dante Gonzalez Health & Wellness Director, Kelly Najjar Assistant Camp and Program Director, Quentin Pickering Camp & Youth Program Director, Linnea Berry Website Manager, Carmen Fritsch HR Director, Renee Dorn Chief Operating Officer, Devon Maloney Assistant Aquatics Director & Swim Lesson Coordinator, Yash Kothari Controller, Gail Shelby Fitness Director, Gerry Gessie Member Services Coordinator, Hope Hornick IT Director, Jonathan Ogintz Aquatics Manager/Lifeguard Coordinator, Sydney Jasinski Vice President Fund Development, Kaite Burke Community Engagement Manager, Kelly Horvath Early Childhood Learning Center Director, Michele Leaman Buildings and Grounds Assistant Director, Mika Newman Buildings and Grounds Director, Mike Ambrosi Membership Administrator/Day Camp Bookkeeper, Nancy Dunham Member Services Director, ReneÃ© Welch Vice President Marketing and Membership, Rosemary Linder Day Competitive Swim Team & HR Administrator, Sarah Gulbin Senior Program Director, Shannon Bujoreanu Chief Financial Officer, Robert Marzan Early Childhood Learning Center Program Specialist & I-SWAP Manager, Cynthia Rodriguez Message * CAPTCHA Name This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged. Î” Close Lakeland Hills Family YMCA 100 Fanny Road Mountain Lakes, NJ Phone: 973-334-2820 membership@lhymca.com Frequently Asked Questions What are your facility hours? Our hours are: Monday â€“ Friday 5:00 A.M â€“ 10:30 P.M. Saturday â€“ Sunday 7:00 A.M. â€“ 6:00 P.M. Directions Can I access other YMCAâ€™s with my Lakeland Hills YMCA membership? Yes. We are proud to offer our members access to YMCA facilities across the United States and Canada that participate in Nationwide Membership. This way, our members can use the Y as often as they like, making it easier to achieve their health and wellness goals. Are group exercise classes available? Yes. We have over 65 weekly classes offered from Yoga to HIT. These classes offer a great workout in a class setting, and are all included with your membership. Can I bring a friend? Yes. As a member, you are given 3 guest passes per year. You can bring a friend up to 3X for free. After that there is a fee. Guests/friends can use facility a max of 3X per year and then must become a member. Is there a trial membership to try out the Y? Yes. We have a 1-Week Trial Membership for free.Â  After that, we have several options that you can choose as a new member. What benefits do I get with my membership? Full Privilege Membership entitles you to use the pool, basketball gymnasium, Health and Fitness Training Center, general membership locker rooms, as well as group fitness, yoga, spinning classes, and all aqua exercise classes. Plus, three free guest passes per year and a fitness orientation. Some age restrictions apply. Long Term Locker Membership offers full privilege membership plus an assigned locker and towel service in an adult only locker room which includes steam room, sauna and TV. What are the pool hours? For Pool Hours and available swim times, please visit our schedules page where you can download swim times as well as gymnasium and group fitness class times. Do you offer financial assistance? Yes. We offer financial aid to ensure that no one is turned away from a Y program or service due to an inability to pay. Visit our Financial Assistance page for more information. STAY CURIOUS Want to know more about how you can make an impact in the community? Fill out this simple form to learn how to get involved. Kids Fun Town is located at the intersection of Danforth Ave. and Woodbine Ave., just west of Woodbine on the south side. If youâ€™re driving, street parking is readily available on Danforth Ave and Woodbine street, other option is to park in the municipal lot by Value Village, South/East of Woodbine and Danforth. Taking the TTC? We are a one-minute walk from the Woodbine subway station. Stroller parking is available and we will happily provide you with a lock if you wish to have one . Action Town Florida boasts the only 5,000 square foot state of the art laser tag arena in Miami! In addition, we have party rooms, an inflatable city, arcades, glow in the dark bumper cars, glow in the dark miniature golf, and one of the largest paintball fields in South Florida! Its a great place to bring the family or hang back with some friends. Action Town Florida Family Fun Center in Miami has a great mix of entertainment for kids as well as adults! Come and experience it yourself and see why were quickly becoming Miami Dade Counties best family entertainment hotspot! Contact us for more info (305) 647-3343 or info@actiontownfl.com

Family Fun Town â€“ Where "Fun' is our Middle Name WHERE "FUN" IS OUR MIDDLE NAME info@familyfuntown.com Where "Fun' is our Middle Name Attractions Birthdays Private Events Cage Rental Menu Specials Arcade Card Calendar JOIN US AT FAMILY FUN TOWN IN ORANGE CITY, FLORIDA WHERE â€œFUNâ€ IS OUR MIDDLE NAME! It is our goal to make your Family Fun Town experience as friendly, comfortable, and FUN as possible. Volusia Countyâ€™s Family Fun Town is a great place for all ages to enjoy our exciting family friendly entertainment complex, including: Birthday Parties, Mini Golf, Go-Karts, Batting Cages, Arcade Games and many more fun filled family attractions. We take great pride in the appearance of our facility as well as the level of service that we provide. Our entire staff is dedicated to providing an excellent Family Fun Town experience. Be Sure To Follow Family Fun Town On Social Media For Specials And Giveaways! Required 2025 Attractions WAIVER FREE ADMISSION - FREE PARKING Facebook Instagram Twitter Youtube Enjoy your day Things to do From Birthday Parties, To Community Group Mini Golf Tournaments.Â  Go Kart Racing, To Great Food.Â  There Is So Much Fun To Be Had At Family Fun Town Birthday Parties Family Events Team Batting Cage Rentals Corporate Outings Full Facility Private Events Arcade Batting Cages Mini Golf Go Karts Google Reviews î¤´ î¤´ î¤´ î¤´ î¤´ 4.4/5 4.4 î¤´ î¤´ î¤´ î¤´ î¤´ 4.4/5 1026 Reviews Read More Testimonials What Customers Say About Family Fun Town Andria McFarland star star star star star Today was our first time coming here we relocated from Ga about 2 weeks ago. My son and I had a blast!!!! Loved the spin flip so cool. It wasnâ€™t over crowded and the prices are very reasonable. I recommend getting the $45 arm band it includes the arcade, batting cages, mini golf and golf cart. Kate Family fun town hosts my company party every year! They are so awesome and thereâ€™s lots for everyone to do! We love the family friendly atmosphere and great staff! Visited on Weekday Wait time No wait Jaileen Cardona Local Guide My family has come here multiple times for the Batting cages, yesterday we did are little ones birthday staff was great very friendly , helpful and Patient specially at the ticket center. Liz Sol Baez Today was the second birthday we celebrate at Family Fun Town and our guest and us had a great time enjoying the mini golf, the go karts and the arcade and batting cages from the parents to the kids we all had a blast the staff is super â€¦ More Reply Like Maire Local Guide Â· 54 reviews Â· 92 photos Great night and great service at the go-carts thank everyone there for a great birthday night for my son and friends Jeff Shafer Local Guide Â· 23 reviews Â· 11 photos Go here often. My 7 year old loves this place has putt putt golf go karts batting cages and arcade with some nice prizes. Friendly staff everything Iâ€™ve been. Can also set up parties here with decent prices on the packages for groups!! Andrea Grayson My grandson had a terrific time. The staff gave him a few extra minutes on the go karts, he loved it! Mini golf was really fun too! Great prices and great staff! Would definitely recommend and will return! Local Guide Robbie Cole We had my sonâ€™s last two birthday parties at Family Fun Town. He loves it! The staff here are amazing!! The Go Karts, batting cages, and mini golf keep all the kids (and adults) smiling every time!! ğŸ˜ƒ The 2-hour wristbands are a great deal, and they often have specials on discounted gift cards available to purchase from their website. We canâ€™t wait to go back! Smiling every time! Liz Sol Eduardo Gerez Today was the second birthday we celebrate at Family Fun Town and our guest and us had a great time enjoying the mini golf, the go karts and the arcade and batting cages from the parents to the kids we all had a blast the staff is super nice every time we go and our host Kirby prepared our party room super beautiful and made sure we had everything we needed at all times we will definitely keep celebrating more things coming up too and really good pizzas cheese fries and wings made in house. Birthdays are great!
